title: IMAGINE AND RELAX@BOULDER PALMS SENIOR APARTMENTS
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 462 Sq.
Ft.
Boulder Palms Senior Apartments, is just perfect for you!
Our beautiful landscaped property has lots to offer for our residents, with tree covered bench areas, bbq grills, activity center and much more, makes for a peaceful and relaxing place to call home!
Come in TODAY and take a tour with our friendly and caring staff members.
Let us help you find a great place to call home!
Welcome to Boulder Palms Senior Apartments a 55+ Community !
Conveniently located on Boulder Highway in Las Vegas near Boulder station and Sam's Town Casinos.
This central location provides residents easy access to near-by recreational facilities, shopping, casinos, entertainment, and dining.
We invite you to come and experience the best in affordable senior living.
At Boulder Palms...ONE CHECK PAYS IT ALL!
LOOK WHAT IS INCLUDED: Water, Sewer, Trash, Electricity, Natural Gas, Telephone with Voice Mail, Expanded Cable (65 Channels)!
PLUS large on-site laundry facility, Activity center with planned events such as Bingo, WII games and movie nights; BBQ Areas, Fitness center and Refreshing Pool and Spa.
Located on the Bus Line and the Silver Star bus.
Features:
Cable Ready, High Speed Internet Access, Wireless Internet Access, Furnished Available, View, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Some Utilities Covered
Community Amenities:
Gas BBQ Grills, Laundry Facility, Hour Laundry Facility, Hour Fitness Room, Pets OK, Hour Pool/Spa
Pet Policy
25 Pounds Full Grown, $300 Deposit & Monthly $35.00
